SELECT c.`source_name` sourceName FROM t_authority a ,t_collectdata c ,t_data_subject d,t_task t WHERE c.id = d.id AND d.subjectId = t.id AND t.id = #{taskId} AND c.`source` IS NOT NULL AND c.`source_name` IS NOT NULL AND c.`publishDate` BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
and (c.score>0.55)
and (c.score >= 0.45 and c.score<=0.55)
and (c.score<0.45)
ORDER BY c.`publishDate` ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT DISTINCT c.`source_name` FROM t_authority a ,t_collectdata c ,t_data_subject d,t_task t WHERE c.id = d.id AND d.subjectId = t.id AND t.id = #{taskId} AND c.`source`!='' AND c.`source` IS NOT NULL AND c.`source_name`!='' AND c.`source_name` IS NOT NULL AND c.`source`= #{sourceName} AND c.`source`!=c.`source_name` AND c.`publishDate` BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
and (c.score>0.55)
and (c.score >= 0.45 and c.score<=0.55)
and (c.score<0.45)
GROUP BY c.`source_name`
